main-page.rule1: To play a match, you must log in; if you don't have an account, you need to register.
main-page.rule2: Only one match can be played at a time.
main-page.rule3: Not making a move for more than 5 minutes will result in the match being canceled.
main-page.request1: Since we allow up to 250 matches at the same time, please log out when you are not active.
